HIS BRITANHIC SAJBSTYfS GOVTSRN)cr^T.3I62A.;BATTLEFIELD M^($IALS. .Bote;by ' the,Secretary,The first Lord of the Admiralty having consented to become a Member of the Committee to be set up to advise the Imperial War Graves Committee as to the selection of sites and designs for the general battlefield memorials, it is requested that this addition to the personnel of the Committee (see Page 2 of Note by the Treasury - CP.3162) may be duly noted.(Sgd.)
